thread.title: Oakland’s Roy Sommer back home with Sharks’ affiliate
thread.title_full: Oakland’s Roy Sommer back home with Sharks’ affiliate - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ross McKeon
title: Oakland’s Roy Sommer back home with Sharks’ affiliate
text:
Roy Sommer, who played hockey as a boy at Berkeley Iceland, returns to the Bay Area as head coach of the San Jose Barracuda, the Sharks’ transplanted AHL affiliate.
